trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Mississauga
There were no other sightings in Mississauga on or around August 28th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsi was driving on the 401 going towards Toronto, and saw three flashing balls of light which i thought were odd for the area where they were. so as i drove i watched it as much as i could. ..they didn't move! they didn't make any noise, is not a tower or a light post, there's no building there either. i really don't know what i saw and i can't find any logical explanation and ii cant get the lights out of my head. ..they were hovering above the tree line. ..i would say above old derry road somewhere. ..there's a big park there called Credit valley conservation Park. maybe ill swing by after work. ..
Summary: red lights flashing like 1,2,3 - no noise, I tried to think of every logical explanation but I can't. ..
